item.title: Daily Mail: Chinese woman carrying malware allegedly got into Mar-a-Lago - Puntaje: 300
item.description: Yujing Zhang, 32, has been charged after she got into President Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort while he was there over the weekend after telling Secret Service she was a member.

item.title: The New York Times Business: There Are Probably Cameras on Your Flight, but Relax, They’re Not On (Yet) - Puntaje: 1000.0
item.description: Vitaly Kamluk, a cybersecurity and malware expert, stirred attention on Twitter in February, including from two senators, after querying Singapore Airlines about what looked like a camera in the seat back.

item.title: Channel News Asia business: Tokyo prosecutors readying new case against Ghosn over Oman payments: Report - Puntaje: 100
item.description: Tokyo prosecutors are preparing to build a fresh case against ousted Nissan Motor Co Ltd chairman Carlos Ghosn over suspect payments the automaker made to a business partner in Oman, Japan's Yomiuri newspaper reported on Wednesday.

item.title: FinTech Singapore: All Shops in Changi Airport Will Accept E-Wallet Payments Very Soon - Puntaje: 2900
item.description:
The various merchants in Changi were probably already on their way towards accepting QR wallet payments one way or another, but a recent agreement may help speed up that process. Changi
